casebody.data:
HOUSING AUTHORITY
v.
CREECH. No. 114P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2007. Robert Spence, Jr., Smithfield, for Smithfield Housing Authority.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of March 2007."
